meanings.sent1: The balloon looked very expanded after we blew more air into it.
meanings.sent2: The expanded cake was big enough to feed the whole party.
meanings.sent3: The expanded pizza was so large, it barely fit through the door!
meanings.sent4: Her expanded smile filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent5: The expanded map showed all the new territories.

meanings.sent1: The expanded project now includes more tasks for us to complete.
meanings.sent2: The expanded budget allows for additional expenses to be covered.
meanings.sent3: The expanded vacation plan now includes a visit to the beach.
meanings.sent4: His expanded knowledge of history impressed the professor.
meanings.sent5: The expanded view from the top of the mountain was breathtaking.

meanings.sent1: The expanded blanket covered the entire bed.
meanings.sent2: The expanded wings of the bird allowed it to soar high in the sky.
meanings.sent3: The expanded umbrella provided shade for everyone at the picnic.
meanings.sent4: The expanded petals of the flower revealed a vibrant color.
meanings.sent5: The expanded newspaper lay open on the table for all to read.
